pages.text: Safes can save items in a safe way, because they are inmune to fire and they have two modes:$(br) $(li)Simple mode: By default, Safes will be bound to the first person that places it / opens and unbound one. Other's persons won't be able to open a safe and they will not be able to break it.

$(li)Key mode: You can craft a $(l:patchouli:tools/supplementaries/key)Key$(/l) and change it's name in an Anvil.$(br2)Then, if you click on a Safe with this key, the safe will be bound to this key name and will only be able to be oppened when you have a key with the same name in the inventory.
